sourcesContent:
<template>
    <canvas ref="chart"></canvas>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { Chart } from 'chart.js/auto';
  
  export default {
    name: 'HotelChart',
    mounted() {
      const ctx = this.$refs.chart.getContext('2d')
      new Chart(ctx, {
        type: 'pie',
        data: {
          datasets: [{
            data: [12, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3],
          }]
        },
      })
    }
  }
  </script>
